title: By the King, a proclamation for the discovery and apprehension of John Lockier, Timothy Butler, Thomas Blood, commonly called Captain Blood, John Mason, and others
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the eighth day of August 1667. In the nineteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
